cu.explanation_en: Setting the MAC layer log level to an invalid enum like 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper MAC layer logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the preamble received target power to 100 dBm is out of the valid negative range and may cause RACH configuration failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將前導接收目標功率設定為 100 dBm 超出有效負數範圍，可能導致 RACH 配置失敗。
